bio: Chris Bowen ([http://blogs.msdn.com/cbowen](http://blogs.msdn.com/cbowen)) is a Developer Evangelist with Microsoft, covering the Northeastern US. An architect and developer with over 17 years of experience, he joined Microsoft after holding senior positions at companies including Monster.com, VistaPrint, Staples, and IDX Systems, as well as consulting with others.
